author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...GABRIELLE STARTING TO GET BETTER ORGANIZED... ...FORECAST TO STRENGTHEN AND BECOME A HURRICANE BY SUNDAY...
summary: ...GABRIELLE STARTING TO GET BETTER ORGANIZED... ...FORECAST TO STRENGTHEN AND BECOME A HURRICANE BY SUNDAY... As of 5:00 PM AST Fri Sep 19 the center of Gabrielle was located near 22.4, -56.6 with movement WNW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1004 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Gabrielle (AT2/AL072025)
